reviewText: This is the best skiing video i have ever watched. it has encouraged me to get back on skies at 72 years of age and now with some new insites into correct technique.

"Terrie Anne Bennett was the key to most of the improvement in my own skiing and coaching over the last couple of seasons. This DVD provides a wealth of information, and it captures Terrie Anne at her best: her explanations are clear and concise, her demonstrations illuminating, and her enthusiasm contagious. And, as always, her skiing inspires me!" --Gerry Bell, PSIA Level II, Sunday River Perfect Turn
